member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect
member.summary: Lighting effect creates an image that appears to be an illuminated non-reflective surface where the light source is limited to a directed cone of light. This effect uses the alpha channel as a height map, and lights it with a point light source.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Spot-diffuse lighting effect.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SpotDiffuseEffect class.

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the SpotDiffuseEffect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input source for SpotDiffuse effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.LimitingConeAngle
member.summary: Angle (in radians) that restricts the region where light is projected. No light is projected outside the cone. Default value pi/2.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.LightTarget
member.summary: Target that the spot light is pointing at. Default value (0,0,0).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.LightPosition
member.summary: Position of the light source. Default value (0,0,0).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.LightColor
member.summary: Color of the incoming light. Default value white.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.HeightMapScale
member.summary: Height map scale factor in the Z direction. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.HeightMapKernelSize
member.summary: Size of the Sobel filter kernel used to convert the input heightmap to surface normal vectors. Default value (1,1).

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.HeightMapInterpolationMode
member.summary: Interpolation mode used to filter the height map. Default value .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.Focus
member.summary: Focus of the spot light. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.DiffuseAmount
member.summary: Intensity of the diffuse light. Default value 1.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.SpotDiffuseEffect.EffectId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier for the effect.

remarks.p: Generic way to query the type of an effect. EffectId is equal to the CLSID_D2D1SpotDiffuse GUID specified in the SDK header d2d1effects.h.

member.summary: Gets a collection of inputs attached to the effect.
